name: Uslaughter PekoRUN!
description:
--WARNING BLOOD AND GUTS!--

-- A downloadable 2D platformer game for PC and Laptop --

PekoRUN! is a short 2D platformer game with a sliiiiight twist, it's very annoying (and hard)!

Can you make it to the end?

I doubt it ;)

We decided to make this game as a form of "sequel", "prequel"? to our other game Gawr Gura Gets Crushed By A Boulder to continue the theme we have going with games including Hololive Idols <3

Of course, to continue from that last game we also had to make it needlessly gory, for absolutely no reason.

Instructions - 

W A S D - move

n - attack

m - discover traps

Attack while holding any of the movement keys to attack in that direction. 

Specifically, if you want to make it past the enemies, you need to attack down on their heads in order to bounce on their heads.

Content -

  1. FOUR(4) Whole methods of being able to DIE!
  2. Lots of blood and guts, or at least as much as I can do with pixel art 💀
  3. Amazing artwork from the likes of Lexicon86!
  4. Attacking!
  5. Trap Finding!
  6. Usada Pekora!

Controls and Credits - Found in game

[DISCLAIMER]

We have absolutely no kind of hatred or anything of the likes to Hololive or Usada Pekora, like seriously. We simply made the game the way it is to continue the "theme" of our last game, and simply because I can.

This game is also (due to time limitations I put on myself) a little bit unpolished, so there could be missing features or bugs present, please report these to me via comments and I will fix them. 

With all that being said, comment if you managed to beat the game! along with any criticism you might have (❁´◡`❁)
